summary: Married insurance adjuster John Forbes falls for femme fatale Mona Stevens while her boyfriend is in jail and all suffer serious consequences as a result.

keywords: insurance investigator|femme fatale|husband wife relationship|justifiable homicide|romantic rivalry

title: Pitfall
